refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the Number of Tidy configuration errors encountered for specified document

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: tidy_config_count returns the number of errors encountered in the given configuration.

example.title: tidy_config_count example
example.programlisting: test'; $config = array('doctype' => 'bogus'); $tidy = tidy_parse_string($html, $config); /* This outputs 1, because 'bogus' isn't a valid doctype */ echo tidy_config_count($tidy); ?>
